gw.api.domain.invoice

Interface ChargeEntryContainer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChargeInitializer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChargeInstallmentChanger

    public interface ChargeEntryContainer
    Common interface for classes that allow for manual addition and modification of invoice items on a charge. For new charges currently being added to BillingCenter, this is the ChargeInitializer class. For change in Payment Plan, this is the ChargeInstallmentChanger class. Need a common interface to be passed around by PaymentPlanImpl, because figuring out down payment and installment dates have nearly identical logic when building and re-building invoice items, and this interface reduces duplicated code that used to exist.

      • getPolicyEffectiveDate

        org.joda.time.DateTime getPolicyEffectiveDate()
        Returns:
        If the Charge is owned by a PolicyPeriod, returns that PolicyPeriod's EffectiveDate. Otherwise null.

      • getPolicyExpirationDate

        org.joda.time.DateTime getPolicyExpirationDate()
        Returns:
        If the Charge is owned by a PolicyPeriod, returns that PolicyPeriod's ExpirationDate. Otherwise null.

      • getInvoiceStream

        InvoiceStream getInvoiceStream()
        Returns:
        The Charge's default InvoiceStream.

      • getFirstRemovedDate

        @Nullable
org.joda.time.DateTime getFirstRemovedDate()
        Returns:
        the earliest event date of the invoice items that were removed from a Payment Plan Change, or null if this is a new charge.

      • getInterval

        org.joda.time.Interval getInterval(org.joda.time.DateTime firstInstallmentDate,
                                 org.joda.time.DateTime latestInstallmentDate)
        Potentially restrict invoicing interval in the case of Payment Plan Change. Don't add installments on or before already existing installments.
        Parameters:
        firstInstallmentDate - First eligible date for installments
        latestInstallmentDate - Last eligible date for installments
        Returns:
        Interval from given dates, at largest, but maybe shrunken based on state of current Entries.

      • getUnallocatedChargeAmount

        MonetaryAmount getUnallocatedChargeAmount()
        Returns:
        Amount of the charge, minus the total of all invoice items that already exist, or are currently planned to be created, and are not planned to be removed.
